name: A 3D Dancing Fashion Dress Up - Princess Disco Party Free Game for Girls
name_original: A 3D Dancing Fashion Dress Up - Princess Disco Party Free Game for Girls
description:
Create your very own amazing 3d fashion look and set the new dancing trend for girls everywhere.

Meet up with Mia and Angela and get ready for Tropical Party time! Dress up your girls in their cocktail outfits or skinny jeans and cute tops, match them up with all the best accessories and a pair of cool shoes and you’re ready to go Party!

Now use the great sliding feature to send the girls off to walk, run and dance their way through warm sunset Beach Bars and stunning Tropical Gardens. Meet up with best friends Akira and the Princess, who both have their own special fashion outfits ready to wow you with.

Now everyone is set to have just the best Party ever!
